title: RTSP assert in OSS-fuzz:  ASSERT Â· blen == 0 || data->req.header
body:
### I did this

~~~

	curl_fuzzer_rtsp: rtsp.c:807: CURLcode rtsp_rtp_write_resp(struct Curl_easy *, const char *, size_t, _Bool, _Bool *): Assertion `blen == 0 || data->req.header' failed.

### I expected the following

_No response_

### curl/libcurl version

It identifies this is the regression range: https://github.com/curl/curl/compare/5da57193b732687f430e75f82e16d71835f9dbf3...d7b6ce64ce0ad787ad2ed3ee05c94938a6b4f551

### operating system

any
